Title: Establishes a tax credit for the purchase and installation of a security camera system on residential- and commercial-owned properties
Summary: Establishes a $500 tax credit for the purchase and installation of a security camera system on residential- and commercial-owned properties in a city having a population of one million or more persons.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishment of a credit for the purchase and installation of a security camera system on residentialand commercial-owned properties in cities having a population of one million or more persons
